title: Mozu no Nie (House of 100 Tongues)
synopsis: The Takashiro family... a traceable Daimyo that leads back to a historical lineage of nobility, has recently been on a shameful course, ruining the image they have had since the old days.
characters: ['Takashiro, Nanako', 'Takashiro, Yushiro', 'Kiriyama, Koichiro', 'Matsushima, Ruriko', 'Takashiro, Shigeyuki', 'Takashiro, Azusa']
